description: Global enforcement rules governing severity resolution, UI behavior, fatality, and output validity for FEOC analysis.

output_validation_rules.description: Every clause-level finding must include a non-empty clause snippet and a non-empty VECTOR.rationale. Missing either invalidates the entire analysis output.
output_validation_rules.name: Reject findings missing clause snippet or vector rationale

on_failure.message: Invalid analysis output: each finding must include clause.snippet.text and analysis.VECTOR.rationale.

output_validation_rules.description: For every authority referenced in VECTOR.authorities and CONSEQUENCE.authorities, auth_id must exist in feoc_statute_citations_v1.0.json and canonical_url/canonical_source must exactly match the statute table.
output_validation_rules.name: Reject outputs whose authority canonical_url/source do not match statute table

on_failure.message: Invalid analysis output: authority canonical_url/canonical_source must match feoc_statute_citations_v1.0.json for each auth_id.

severity_resolution_rules.description: Overall severity equals the highest severity present across all findings.
